REGISTER_REFERERS.COLLEAGUE: It was recommended by a colleague

success.account_has_been_registered: Your account has been created. Plese confirm your email address in order to login. A verification email has been sent to your email address.
success.checked_in: You have succesfully checked in this unit
success.checked_out: You have succesfully checked out this unit
success.forgot_password_has_been_sent: If there is an account using this email address you will receive a message with the instructions on how to reset your password. Please check your inbox.
success.resend_verification_has_been_sent: Verification email has been resent to your email address. Please check your inbox.
success.reset_password_complete: Your password has been changed. You can now login with your new password.
success.set_password_complete: Your password has been set. You can now login with your new password.
success.message_sent: Your message has been sent successfully
success.sms_code_sent: We have sent you and SMS with you login code.

rules.phone_must_be_a_valid_phone_number: Phone field must be a valid phone number
rules.postal_code_must_be_a_postal_code: Postal code field must be a valid postal code
rules.password_is_not_a_valid_password: Password must be of minimum 8 characters using letters, numbers and any of the following symbols !@#$%^&*
rules.all_answers_elements_must_be_unique: You have to insert unique answers
rules.answers_should_not_be_empty: Answer list should not be empty
rules.answers_must_be_an_array: You have to provide a list of answers
rules.educational_unit_must_be_a_string: Educational unit must be a string
rules.educational_unit_should_not_be_empty: Educational unit should not be empty

fields.passwords_match: This field must match password field.
fields.valid_email: Please fill in a valid email address.
fields.valid_sms_code: A valid 6 digit sms code is required.

user.socialSecurityNumber: Social security number already in use

forgot_password.email_sent_recently: A password request has already been requested in the last 5 minutes for this email address. Please try again in 5 minutes.
forgot_password.token_not_valid: The reset password token is not valid.
forgot_password.no_valid_token_can_be_created: No valid token can be created. Please try again later.

email_verification.email_sent_recently: A verification email has already been requested in the last 5 minutes for this email address. Please try again in 5 minutes.
email_verification.token_not_valid: The email verification token is not valid.
email_verification.no_valid_token_can_be_created: No valid token can be created. Please try again later.
email_verification.email_not_valid: We can not confirm your email account. Please request another email verification and try again.

phone_verification.sms_sent_recently: A verification SMS has already been requested in the last 5 minutes for this phone number. Please try again in 5 minutes.
phone_verification.no_valid_token_can_be_created: A valid sms code could not be ganerate. Make sure your phone number is correct and try again

login.email_not_confirmed: You have not confirmed your email address. Please click here to resend verification email.
login.account_not_confirmed: You have not confirmed your account. Please click here to resend verification email or click here to do confirm via SMS.
login.account_suspended: Your account has been suspended. Please contact the administrator in order to regain access

settings.not_saved: An unknown error occured saving you settings

error.user_not_found: Cannot login, please check your email address/phone number and password and try again.
error.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.pdf_introduction_to_long: Sorry, the text provided is to long.

register.referer: Where did you hear about the PORTAL?

texts.title: Create an account
texts.description: In order to use our system you will have to create an account by providing some information about you
texts.fill_credentials: Please fill in your login credentials.
texts.fill_userinfo: Please your fill in your personal information.

texts.title: Welcome back
texts.description: In order to continue you have to provide your login credentials. Please fill in the fields below.
texts.subtitle: Sign in

texts.title: Resend email verification

texts.description: Enter your email address to receive you verification email.

texts.title: Email verification
texts.description_validated: Thank you for validating your email address. You can now login using the form below.

texts.title: Account verification
texts.account_created_1: Your account has been created. Please confirm your email address in order to login. A verification email has been sent to your email address. If you have not recieved the email yet, please
texts.sms_sent: We have sent an SMS containing the confirmation code for your account.
texts.not_recive_1: If you did not recieve the code
